files.patch:
@@ -55,0 +55,4 @@

+
@@ -63,4 +67,0 @@

@@ -86,0 +86,2 @@

+  static_assert(CPU_M == HWCAP_ISA_M, "Flag CPU_M must follow Linux HWCAP");
@@ -87,0 +89,2 @@

@@ -89,4 +93,0 @@

-  static_assert(CPU_M == HWCAP_ISA_M, "Flag CPU_M must follow Linux HWCAP");
